爥字的基本解释

爥
zhú
古同“烛”：“东爥沧海，西耀流沙。”

爥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhú］
［《廣韻》之欲切，入燭，章。］
亦作“爥1”。“烛1”的繁体字。
(1)火炬；火把。
(2)蜡烛。
(3)点燃；燃着。
(4)照亮；照见。
(5)指显露，呈现。
(6)明察；洞悉。
(7)通“”。肛门。参见“燭營”。
(8)星名。参见“燭星”。
(9)俗称电灯的功率单位。即瓦。
(10)量词。盏。
(11)姓。春秋郑有烛之武。见《左传·僖公三十年》。

爥字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　爥； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页688第14
【韻會】朱欲切，音囑。本作曯。照也。一通作燭。【班固·東都賦】散皇明以爥幽。

爥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
爥字的起名意思

暂无。

爥
Basic explanation of words
爥
zhú
Gu Tong's "Candle": "East is the sea, and the west is the quicksand."
爥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhú］
[The desire to cut in "Guang Yun", into the candle, chapter. ]
Also known as "爥1". Traditional characters for "Candle 1".
(1) Torch; torch.
(2) Candles.
(3) Ignite; burn.
(4) To illuminate; to see.
(5) Refers to revealing and presenting.
(6) Observation; Insight.
(7) Pass "". anus. See "Candle Camp".
(8) Star name. See "Candle Star".
(9) The unit of power commonly known as an electric light. Namely tile.
(10) Quantifiers. Cup.
(11) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Zheng Youzhu's martial arts. See "Thirty Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xi Gong".
爥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　爥; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 688 14
【Rhyme Meeting】Zhu wants to cut, voice advice. This is 曯. Photo also. One pass is a candle. [Bangu·Dongdu Fu] Disperse the emperor to make you quiet.
爥
